titleStmt.title: The great venture shewing that man's life in this world is a venture, wherein he runs the hazard of an everlasting estate of happiness or misery in another world, according as he behaves himself here : also advice to youth, with several other things profitable for all who will seriously read and mind them / by E.A., a well-wisher to the souls of men.
titleStmt.author: E. A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hen. Million, at the Common Huntsman in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Second part has caption title: Advice to youth.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
